member.name: T:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter
member.summary:
This converts a directory (and optionally the sub-directories) of SVG files to XAML files in a specified directory, maintaining the original directory structure.
It uses or converter to process each SVG file in the specified directory.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified drawing or rendering settings.
member.param: This specifies the settings used by the rendering or drawing engine. If this is , the default settings is used.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the directory copying is recursive, that is includes the sub-directories.
member.value: This property is if the sub-directories are included in the directory copy; otherwise, it is . The default is .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter.FallbackOnWriterError
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to fall back and use the .NET Framework XAML writer when an error occurred in using the custom writer.
member.value: This is if the converter falls back to using the system XAML writer when an error occurred in using the custom writer; otherwise, it is . If , an exception, which occurred in using the custom writer will be thrown. The default is .

member.summary: Gets the full path of the last SVG file not successfully converted.

member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the SVG file to load into this .
member.value: A specifying the path to the SVG source file. The SVG file can be located on a computer, network or assembly resources. Settings this to will close any rendered SVG diagram.

member.summary: Gets or sets the SVG contents to load into this .
member.value: A specifying the embedded SVG contents. Settings this to will close any opened diagram.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgCanvas.StreamSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the to the SVG source to load into this .
member.value: A specifying the stream to the SVG source. Settings this to will close any opened diagram.

remarks.para: The stream source has precedence over the Uri property. If set (not ), the stream source will be rendered instead of the Uri source.

WPF controls do not implement the interface and cannot properly dispose any stream set to it. To avoid this issue and also any problem of the user accidentally closing the stream, this control makes a copy of the stream to memory stream.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgCanvas.AutoSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to automatically resize this based on the size of the loaded drawing.
member.value: This is if this is automatically resized based on the size of the loaded drawing; otherwise, it is . The default is , and the user-defined size or the parent assigned layout size is used.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgCanvas.OptimizePath
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the path geometry is optimized using the .
member.value: This is if the path geometry is optimized using the ; otherwise, it is . The default is .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgCanvas.TextAsGeometry
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the texts are rendered as path geometry.
member.value: This is if texts are rendered as path geometries; otherwise, this is . The default is .
member.remarks: The text features of the SVG format are complex and difficult to fully support without directly reverting the text paths (or glyph geometry). This options will, therefore, be removed in future versions of the library, as it is not always honored when set to .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgCanvas.IncludeRuntime
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the SharpVectors.Runtime.dll classes are used in the generated output.
member.value: This is if the SharpVectors.Runtime.dll classes and types are used in the generated output; otherwise, it is . The default is .
member.remarks: The use of the SharpVectors.Runtime.dll prevents the hard-coded font path generated by the class, support for embedded images etc.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgCanvas.CultureInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets the main culture information used for rendering texts.
member.value: An instance of the specifying the main culture information for texts. The default is the English culture.

remarks.para: This is the culture information passed to the class instance for the text rendering.
The library does not currently provide any means of splitting texts into its multi-language parts.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgCanvas.IgnoreRootViewbox
member.summary: Gets or sets a value to indicate turning off viewbox at the root of the drawing.
member.value:
For image outputs, this will force the original size to be saved.
The default value is .
member.remarks:
There are reported cases where are diagrams displayed in Inkscape program, but will not show when converted. These are diagrams on the drawing canvas of Inkspace but outside the svg viewbox.
When converted the drawings are also converted but not displayed due to clipping. Setting this property to will clear the clipping region on conversion.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgCanvas.EnsureViewboxSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value to indicate preserving the original viewbox size when saving images.
member.value:
For image outputs, this will force the original size to be saved.
The default value is . However, the ImageSvgConverter converted sets this to by default.
member.remarks: Setting this to will cause the rendering process to draw a transparent box around the output, if a viewbox is defined. This will ensure that the original image size is saved.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgCanvas.EnsureViewboxPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets a value to indicate applying a translate transform to the viewbox to ensure it is visible when rendered.
member.value:
This determines whether a transformation is applied to the rendered drawing. For drawings where the top-left position of the viewbox is off the screen, due to negative values, this will ensure the drawing is visible.
The default value is . Set this value to if you wish to apply your own transformations to the drawings.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgCanvas.Drawings
member.summary: Gets the drawing from the SVG file conversion.
member.value: An instance of the specifying the converted drawings which is rendered in this canvas.

member.value: A specifying the font for the message text. The default value is .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgCanvas.MessageFontSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the desired font for the message text.
member.value: A value specifying the font size of the message text. The default is 48 pixels. The font size must be a positive number.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgCanvas.MessageOpacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the opacity factor applied to the entire message text when it is rendered in the user interface (UI).
member.value: The opacity factor. Default opacity is 1.0. Expected values are between 0.0 and 1.0.

member.summary: Gets or sets the content of the message.
member.value: A specifying the content of the message text. The default is "Loading...". This value can be overriden in the method.

member.summary: Gets or sets a brush that describes the background of a message text.
member.value: A specifying the brush that is used to fill the background of the message text. The default is . If set to , the background will not be drawn.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgCanvas.MessageFillBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush with which to fill the message text. This is optional, and can be . If the brush is , no fill is drawn.
member.value: A specifying the fill of the message text. The default is .
member.remarks: If both the fill and stroke brushes of the message text are , no text is drawn.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgCanvas.MessageStrokeBrush

member.value: A specifying the brush of the for stroking the message text. The default is .
member.remarks: If both the fill and stroke brushes of the message text are , no text is drawn.

member.summary: Gets or sets the to the SVG source to load into this .
member.value: A specifying the stream to the SVG source. Settings this to will close any opened diagram.

remarks.para: The stream source has precedence over the Uri property. If set (not ), the stream source will be rendered instead of the Uri source.

WPF controls do not implement the interface and cannot properly dispose any stream set to it. To avoid this issue and also any problem of the user accidentally closing the stream, this control makes a copy of the stream to memory stream.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgViewbox.IgnoreRootViewbox
member.summary: Gets or sets a value to indicate turning off viewbox at the root of the drawing.
member.value:
For image outputs, this will force the original size to be saved.
The default value is .
member.remarks:
There are reported cases where are diagrams displayed in Inkscape program, but will not show when converted. These are diagrams on the drawing canvas of Inkspace but outside the svg viewbox.
When converted the drawings are also converted but not displayed due to clipping. Setting this property to will clear the clipping region on conversion.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgViewbox.EnsureViewboxSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value to indicate preserving the original viewbox size when saving images.
member.value:
For image outputs, this will force the original size to be saved.
The default value is . However, the ImageSvgConverter converted sets this to by default.
member.remarks: Setting this to will cause the rendering process to draw a transparent box around the output, if a viewbox is defined. This will ensure that the original image size is saved.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgViewbox.EnsureViewboxPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets a value to indicate applying a translate transform to the viewbox to ensure it is visible when rendered.
member.value:
This determines whether a transformation is applied to the rendered drawing. For drawings where the top-left position of the viewbox is off the screen, due to negative values, this will ensure the drawing is visible.
The default value is . Set this value to if you wish to apply your own transformations to the drawings.

member.name: T:SharpVectors.Converters.XmlXamlWriter
member.summary: This is a customized XAML writer, which provides Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) serialization of provided runtime objects into XAML.

remarks.para: This is designed to be used by the SVG to XAML converters, and may not be useful in general applications.
The writer is created with help from the following posts (Archived Forums):

para.see: Saving and Loading of Interface in XAML Format

member.overloads: Initializes a new instance of the class.
